translations: v.返回（revert 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: When the lease ends, the property reverts to the owner.
sentences.translation: 租约到期后，房屋归还业主。

sentences.sentence: The title now reverts to a woman in the United States.
sentences.translation: 现在主人公改成了一名美国妇女。

sentences.sentence: This reverts a JFS2 file system to a point-in-time snapshot.
sentences.translation: 这会将 JFS2 文件系统回滚到一个时间点快照。
